title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: A Comprehensive Update on Recent Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Terror infrastructure and military structure; the IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in southern Lebanon.

A short time ago, fighter planes attacked a military structure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Maroun al-Ras area and terror infrastructure of the organization in the spaces of Kfar Kila and Al-Khiyam. In addition, an IDF tank fired in the Al-Jibin area.

In the last few hours, launches from Lebanese territory to Israeli territory in the areas of Kiryat Shmona and Kfar Yuval have been identified, the IDF attacked the sources of the fire.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3I9al8d.
